display_long_description:
Update 0.1.5:
- Finally added DLC maps
- Changed snowboard force to align with surface, should control a little better now, especially on steep slopes
Added maps:
  Swiss Divot - A recreation of an existing ski resort, there isn't an end point to this map, you just explore it
  Half Pipe Hell - Liked the half pipe from the starting map? Try this one
  Big Twister - Liked the spiral from the starting map? Try this one

Update 0.1.4:
- Added some more rotation settings

Update 0.1.3:
- Released on Meta Store!!!
- Added a height offset setting
- Extra Maps are finished but I still need to figure how how to make them paid DLC

Update 0.1.2:
- Setting spawn also sets rotation(you now won't respawn facing away from the board, hopefully)
- Removed copyright songs
- Add new rock songs
- Fixed tripod trick not working 
- Fixed sound settings glitch
- Added rotation threshold time slider in settings (Affects how long after a jump you can start a rotation)



Features:
- A physics based snowboarding system that factors in edge angle, momentum, and snowboard direction in calculating forces.

- A trick system that includes jumping, grinding on rails and boxes, flips, spins, grabs air time and tripoding just cause.

- A crash system that will make you bail if you catch an edge, land a flip to early, or mess up a landing.

- A settings system that allows you to change difficulty(makes it easier/harder to crash), enable/disable tricks and show/hide hands.

- Music and volume settings
